testsuite.system-out: Mouse Hovering to Desktop and Clicking on it: [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (2c643bdd427dead3b7a8dadd71d788ab)] -> link text: Desktops] Arrange products in descending order

Clicking on currency dropdown Mouse Hovering to Desktop and Clicking on it: [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (13c3bae32f073b56d5df8903b81c217a)] -> link text: Desktops] Cliking on HP product Displaying error message Selecting date, month and year Enter quantity to quantity field [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (13c3bae32f073b56d5df8903b81c217a)] -> id: input-quantity] Clicking on add to cart button Displaying error message Clicking on shopping cart link Enter shoppingcart text error message [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (13c3bae32f073b56d5df8903b81c217a)] -> xpath: //div[@id='content']/h1[contains(text(), 'Shopping Cart')]] Verify Product name error Message[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (13c3bae32f073b56d5df8903b81c217a)] -> xpath: //div[@class = 'table-responsive']/table/tbody/tr/td[2]/a] Verify model error message[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (13c3bae32f073b56d5df8903b81c217a)] -> xpath: //div[@class = 'table-responsive']/table/tbody/tr/td[3]] Verify price total error message[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (13c3bae32f073b56d5df8903b81c217a)] -> xpath: //div[@class = 'table-responsive']/table/tbody/tr/td[6]]
